metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3521 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in the cssgen contrib module in GeSHi before 1.0.8.11 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the (1) geshi-path or (2) geshi-lang-path parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-geshi - 1.0.8.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: geshi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.8.11-2').
